mapper.select: SELECT m.menus_id, m.user_id, u.username, m.menus_name, m.menus_url, m.status FROM menus m LEFT JOIN user_information u ON m.user_id = u.uuid WHERE m.status = 1
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO menus (menus_id, user_id, menus_name, menus_url, status) VALUES (#{menus_id}, #{user_id}, #{menus_name}, #{menus_url}, #{status})
mapper.update: UPDATE menus SET status = 0 WHERE menus_id = #{menusId}
